org.xmlcml.euclid
Class Real2Vector

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.euclid.Real2Vector
All Implemented Interfaces:
EuclidConstants
public class Real2Vector
extends java.lang.Object
implements EuclidConstants

a (Java) Vector of Real2s (Note that 'Vector' is used by Java to describe an array of objects - there is no relationship to geometrical vectors in this package.)

Support is also given for the two component arrays as RealArrays

Default is an empty (Java) Vector;

Author:
(C) P. Murray-Rust, 1996

Constructor Detail

Real2Vector

public Real2Vector()
constructor.

Real2Vector

public Real2Vector(double[] flarray)
            throws EuclidException
Formed by feeding in an existing array to a 2xn matrix THE COLUMN IS THE FASTEST MOVING INDEX, that is the matrix is filled as flarray(0,0, flarray(0,1). Primarily for compatibility with other apps

Parameters:
flarray -
Throws:
EuclidException - array must have even number of elements

getSquaredDifference

public double getSquaredDifference(Real2Vector r2v)
squared difference between corresponding points in 2 real2Vectors. must be of same length else returns Double.NaN

Parameters:
r2v - vector to compare
Returns:
sum ((x1-x2)**2 + (y1-y2)**2)

getSquaredDistances

public double[] getSquaredDistances(Real2Vector r2v)
gets array of squared distances between corresponding points. array of d(this(i)-r2v(i))^2; returns null if Real2Vectors are different lengths

Parameters:
r2v - other vector
Returns:
array of squares distances else null

regularPolygon

public static Real2Vector regularPolygon(int nsides,
                                         double rad)
create regular polygon. centre is at 0.0, first point at 0, rad points go clockwise (rad*cos, rad*sin)

Parameters:
nsides -
rad - the radius
Returns:
array of points

getDistanceMatrix

public RealMatrix getDistanceMatrix(java.util.List<Real2> coords2)
get rectangular distance matrix. matrix need not be square or symmetric unless coords == coords2 d(ij) is distance between coord(i) and coords2(j).

Parameters:
coords2 -
Returns:
distance matrix
